tool_description: Creates formatted FOIA appeal letters addressing specific exemptions and denial reasons from initial agency responses.

original_tracking_number.description: Tracking number from original FOIA request

agency_name.description: Name of agency that issued the denial

requester_name.description: Full name of the person filing the appeal

error_messages: Missing required contact information: Provide all requester contact details (name, address, email).
Invalid denial date: Use ISO 8601 date-time format and ensure date is not in the future.
Empty exemptions list: Provide at least one exemption to challenge.
Mismatched arrays: The number of exemptions_to_challenge must match the number of appeal_arguments.
Appeal deadline passed: The deadline for filing this appeal may have expired.
Invalid exemption codes: One or more exemption codes are not recognized FOIA exemptions.
usage: Provide original request details, requester information, denial specifics, and appeal arguments. The tool generates a properly formatted appeal letter with legal arguments against the cited exemptions.

appeal_subject_line.description: Recommended email subject line for appeal

appeal_office_address.description: Correct address for filing the appeal
